name: Pekon
description: Based off of Pien and Paon. A horror game featuring Hololive's Usada Pekora as, Pekon. Wander around the building finding and destroying Pekon's carrots. That is the only way to escape. You must use your environment to block Pekon's pursuit, and stay out of her line of sight. All of this while managing an ever depleting battery on your flashlight.
